sourcesContent:
Please enter a valid email!

User Data is invalid!

Your Data

Username: {{ user.username }}

Mail: {{ user.email }}

City: {{ user.city }}

Commnets: {{ user.comments }}

Gender: {{ user.gender }}

import { Component, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { @ViewChild('f', { static: false }) signupForm: NgForm; city = 'erode'; comments = ''; genders = ['Female', 'Male']; user = { username: '', email: '', city: '', comments: '', gender: '' }; submitted = false; // onSubmit(form: NgForm) { // console.log(form); // } onSubmit() { this.submitted = true; this.user.username = this.signupForm.value.userData.username; this.user.email = this.signupForm.value.userData.email; this.user.city = this.signupForm.value.city; this.user.comments = this.signupForm.value.comments; this.user.gender = this.signupForm.value.gender; this.signupForm.reset(); } }
